explains: n. 继承物，遗产；遗传特征
wordGroup: inheritance hierarchy 继承层次；继承体系；继承阶层架构
autosomal dominant inheritance 常染色体显性遗传

sentences.en: She spent all her inheritance in a year.
sentences.cn: 她在一年之内用完了所有继承的遗产。

sentences.en: She feared losing her inheritance to her stepmother.
sentences.cn: 她担心她的遗产会落到继母的手里。

sentences.en: Eye colour shows more than your genetic inheritance.
sentences.cn: 眼睛的颜色显示的不只是你基因的遗传特征。
